articles.title: Varun Dhawan and Samantha’s ‘Citadel: Honey Bunny,’ From Russo Bros and Raj & DK, Sets Prime Video Streaming Date (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
articles.description: Prime Video has set a premiere date for 'Citadel: Honey Bunny,' the Indian instalment of the 'Citadel' franchise starring Varun Dhawan and Samantha.
articles.content:
Prime Video has set a global premiere date for Citadel: Honey Bunny, the Indian instalment of the Citadel franchise. The series stars Varun Dhawan and Samantha in lead roles.
